overview:
Joe Wellborn brings over two decades of marketing experience to National Surgery Network. From capturing sales leads through member utilization, Wellborn specializes in delivering strategic messages clearly and effectively, and he also champions a positive brand experience through all interactions with the company.

Prior to National Surgery Network, Wellborn helped other health benefit companies reach and deliver care to over 300,000 covered lives.

Before shifting his expertise to the health benefits arena, Wellborn spent 20 years in graphic design and web development. For several years during the dot-com boom, Wellborn was a managing partner of a full-scale design and development company in San Francisco, where he focused on growing start-ups from early conception to widespread adoption. He has produced campaigns for many national brands, including the Commission on Presidential Debates, American Airlines, Haggar Apparel Company, Time Life Publishing, San Francisco Opera, the Smithsonian Institution, the City of San Francisco, the White House Historical Association, National Cancer Institute, the Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation, and many more.
